label: Personal health
article: Comparison of the clinical and functional outcomes following 3- and 4-corner fusions
content: I have to chose between these 2 surgeries. I want to make an informed  decision as it is my body and I only get one

label: Education
article: Frequent riding sessions daily elevate stress, blood lactic acid, and heart rate of thoroughbred riding horses
content: I am a veterinary behaviorist at UC Davis and wish to be able to fully reference this article when teaching veterinary students

label: Social change
article: Resilience in higher education students: a scoping review
content: I am an intern for a non-profit organization working to improve community resilience in the aftermath of the fires in Northern California. I have been tasked with creating and offering programming to higher education institutions in our area and prefer to keep my material to high empirical standards

label: Research
article: Using a system dynamics model to assess the effects of capital subsidies and feed-in tariffs on solar pv installations
content: I'm conducting research on the cost of customer acquisition in the US Residential Solar Industry for my Master's thesis. This article would be important to understand the impacts of high customer acquisition costs on the marginal propensity to purchase solar, and then would enable me to calculate the carbon impact of high customer acquisition costs.

label: Medical practice
article: Emerging roles of adjunct therapies in acquired thrombotic thrombocytopenia purpura
content: I'm a doctor working in an italian hospital (San Camillo Hospital in Rome); my job is in the apheresis unit of transfusion service, and this important review will help me and my colleagues to be up to date in thesetting of TTP diagnosis and treatment.

label: Education
article: Hand massage therapy for pain management after cardiac surgery: acceptability and feasibility in the intensive care unit
content: I am in a nursing research class learning how to present evidence based practice, quantitative studies.  This is the subject content my group chose to present.  This content will help me learn how to interpret research and determine validity of evidence

label: Social change
article: The relationship of adverse childhood experiences to ptsd, depression, poly-drug use and suicide attempt in reservation-based native american adolescents and young adults
content: I am writing a paper on the cultural competencies for working with at risk youth in Native communities
